strapiPost.title: Tinkerfest Returns to the Amazeum This Month
strapiPost.content:
Put your tinkering caps on and get ready for some fun during Tinkerfest — the Amazeum’s celebration of tinkering, making, and creating on Saturday, Sep 23, from 10a-5p.

Hands-On Learning: Tinkerfest brings together craftspeople, educators, artists, engineers, scientists, and technologists from diverse backgrounds to interact with families, promote creativity and curiosity, and support a community of makers.

Tinker Together: Whether you’re a beginner or an avid tinkerer, join the fun! There will be hands-on activities for all ages, providing the perfect event for families to play, connect, create, and make.

Tickets go on sale tomorrow, Sep 9. Learn more HERE.
